dict.acceptation: 国家，国土；国民；乡下，农村；故乡；
祖国的，故乡的；地方的，乡村的；粗鲁的；乡村音乐的；

sent.orig: Manners are quite different from country to.
Our country is changing from a backwards agricultural country into a newly developed industrial country.
sent.trans: 我国正在从落后农业国变为新兴的工业国。

sent.orig: Make country enters industrialized country ranks more quickly from an agricultural country with very lagging industry.
sent.trans: 使我国从一个工业十分落后的农业国较快步入工业化国家行列。

sent.orig: That country is transforming from a backward agricultural country into an advanced industrial country.
sent.trans: 该国正在从落后的农业国转变为先进的工业国。

sent.orig: To me, England is the country and the country is England.
sent.trans: 在我看来，英格兰是乡村，乡村英格兰。
